title: Teamwork Competency Training and Assessment Through Experimental Team Formation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Language Instruction and Team Project Experience
context.additional_context: Team-based practical training course for practicing elementary teachers to enhance linguistic collaboration. Applies experimental team management approaches with learners of diverse learning styles

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with team members of diverse learning styles to complete language education project deliverables.
Performing the role of a facilitator within teams, learners can diagnose their collaborative competencies through peer and self-assessment.
Learners can resolve conflicts arising from experimental team formations and employ effective communication strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
